title: GoKwik acquires Shopify app Return Prime, forays into global market
description: The acquisition marks GoKwikâ€™s entry into the international markets of UK, Europe and the US. As online shopping continues to grow, particularly in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic, the ability to efficiently manage returns has become a key differentiator for merchants.
content: GoKwik, an eCommerce enabler has acquired Return Prime, a global returns management app in the Shopify ecosystem.
